sentences.sentence: "Dear" the dear beak in the dear concha crying.
sentences.translation: 只用喙口对着耳垂呼唤，“亲爱的。”

sentences.sentence: Methods Aeration of the middle turbinate is termed "concha bullosa" (CB) .
sentences.translation: 材料与方法所谓鼻甲泡是指中鼻甲的气化。

sentences.sentence: The plasty of cavity of auricular concha and mastoid obliteration can raise drying ear rate.
sentences.translation: 耳甲腔成形和乳突腔骨膜瓣填充可增加干耳率。
